products.name: Soy Beans
products.description: High-grade non-GMO soy beans. Our soybeans are cultivated using sustainable farming practices, resulting in high protein content and excellent germination rates. Perfect for both human consumption and animal feed.

products.name: Maize
products.description: Premium white maize, sun-dried to perfection. We produce maize with optimal moisture content, ensuring longer shelf life and superior taste. Ideal for milling, animal feed, and industrial uses.

products.name: Groundnuts
products.description: Nutrient-rich Malawian groundnuts. Our groundnuts are hand-selected for quality, with high oil content and rich flavor. Grown in mineral-rich soils for maximum nutritional value.

products.name: Fresh Milk
products.description: Daily farm-fresh dairy milk from our pasture-raised cows. Produced under strict hygiene standards, our milk is rich in calcium and vitamins, with no artificial additives or preservatives.

products.name: Beef & Goat Meat
products.description: Ethically raised, high-quality meat. Our animals are grass-fed and raised in spacious pastures, resulting in tender, flavorful meat that meets international food safety standards.

staff.name: Farm Manager
staff.description: Oversees all farm operations, ensuring efficient production and quality control.

staff.name: Lead Agronomist
staff.description: Manages crop health, soil quality, and implements sustainable farming practices.

staff.name: Logistics Head
staff.description: Coordinates product distribution, transportation, and supply chain management.

staff.name: Quality Control Officer
staff.description: Ensures all products meet international quality and safety standards.

staff.name: Livestock Supervisor
staff.description: Manages livestock health, breeding programs, and ethical farming practices.

staff.name: Export Coordinator
staff.description: Handles export documentation, compliance, and international client relations.
